org.openlaszlo.lzproject.model
Class PersistenceBaseClass

java.lang.Object
  org.openlaszlo.lzproject.model.PersistenceBaseClass
Direct Known Subclasses:
Project, Projects, Task, Tasks, User, Users
public class PersistenceBaseClass
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for managing the connection to the Apache Derby database. All the classes in the model extends PersistenceBase Class.

Author:
raju

Method Detail

dbConnect

protected boolean dbConnect()
Connect to Derby database. The Derby DB files are located in WEB-INF/lzprojectdb/ folder. This pass is used in the call to DriverManager.getConnection(java.lang.String, java.util.Properties).

dbDisconnect

protected void dbDisconnect()
Disconnect from the Derby DB.

handleSQLError

protected RestServiceResult handleSQLError(java.sql.SQLException e,
                                           RestServiceResult result)
Adds the localized error message and the SQL state to the RestServiceResult object.

Parameters:
e - The SQL exception.
result - REST service result object.
Returns:
The REST service result object containing the SQL state and a localized message.
